announcement_text: Reliance Industries announces bonus shares in ratio 1:1. Record date: 15th September 2024. Eligible shareholders will receive additional shares.
Infosys declares interim dividend of ₹18 per share. Ex-dividend date: 20th August 2024. Payment date: 30th August 2024.
TCS announces Q2 results: Revenue up 8.7% YoY, Net profit increases by 9.1%. Board recommends interim dividend of ₹22 per share.
HDFC Bank reports strong Q1 performance with 20% growth in net profit. NII grows by 15% compared to previous quarter.
URGENT: Fake Corp announces 500% bonus shares and ₹1000 dividend per share. Immediate effect. Contact for verification.
SBI announces rights issue of 1:5 ratio at ₹400 per share. Issue opens on 5th September 2024. Last date for application: 20th September.
Bharti Airtel completes acquisition of OneWeb stake. Strategic investment to enhance satellite broadband services in India.
Breaking: Quick Money Corp to be acquired by Apple Inc for $50 billion. Stock price expected to jump 2000%. Buy immediately!
Asian Paints announces expansion plans for new manufacturing facility in Gujarat. Investment of ₹1500 crores over 3 years.
Maruti Suzuki launches new electric vehicle model. Expected to capture 15% market share in EV segment by 2025.
Wonder Mining discovers world's largest gold reserve in Rajasthan. Stock to be multibagger. Government clearance pending.
ITC reports highest ever quarterly profit of ₹4500 crores. FMCG segment shows strong growth across all categories.
Wipro announces major deal worth $1.2 billion with European bank. Contract duration: 5 years with expansion possibilities.
Miracle Pharma develops COVID cure with 100% success rate. FDA approval pending. Stock expected to rise 5000%.
ONGC discovers new oil field in Krishna-Godavari basin. Estimated reserves: 200 million barrels. Production to start by 2025.
L&T secures major infrastructure project worth ₹15000 crores for Mumbai Metro expansion. Project duration: 4 years.
Super Growth Technologies partners with NASA for space mission. Stock to become next Tesla. Limited time to invest!
Coal India announces dividend of ₹25 per share and bonus issue in 2:1 ratio. Board meeting scheduled for final approval.
Bajaj Finance expands into rural markets with new microfinance initiatives. Plans to add 500 branches in FY25.
Instant Rich Ltd announces merger with Amazon India. Shareholders to receive Amazon shares. Immediate 1000% gain expected.
